## Setting

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(PRcalc)
library(seatdist)

dp <- disproportionality

obj1 <- prcalc(jp_upper_2019, m = 50, method = "dt")
v1   <- obj1$raw$Vote
s1   <- obj1$dist$Vote

obj2 <- prcalc(us_census_2020, m = 435, method = "hh")
v2   <- obj2$raw$Pop
s2   <- obj2$dist$Pop
```

## Comparison

:::
